modules.name: Auxilliary Clone Expander
modules.description: Adds additional cloned poly input/output pairs to Clone Merge, Poly Merge, or Poly Unison

modules.name: Bay Input
modules.description: Teleporting input utility with custom labels for patch bays

modules.name: Bay Normal
modules.description: Teleporting output utility with normal inputs and custom labels for patch bays

modules.name: Bay Output
modules.description: Teleporting output utility with custom labels for patch bays

modules.name: Benjolin Oscillator
modules.description: Complex chaotic oscillator emulating the oscillator and rungler components of a Benjolin

modules.name: Bernoulli Switch
modules.description: Randomly route two inputs to two outputs, with built in scaling and offset capabilities

modules.name: Bernoulli Switch Expander
modules.description: Additional CV inputs and attenuators for Bernoulli Switch

modules.name: Blocker
modules.description: Blocks expander chains

modules.name: Bypass
modules.description: Bypass one or more modules at the end of patched cables

modules.name: Clone Merge
modules.description: Clone up to 8 monophonic inputs and merge all channels into 1 polyphonic output

modules.name: HQ - Harmonic Quantizer
modules.description: Computes a selected harmonic or subharmonic partial relative to a root V/Oct, or quantizes input V/Oct to the nearest partial relative to the root

modules.name: Knob 5
modules.description: 5 configurable constant voltage knobs

modules.name: Linear Beats
modules.description: Convert multiple trigger/gate channels into a linear drumming pattern

modules.name: Linear Beats Expander
modules.description: Add bypass and input/output mutes to the Linear Beats module

modules.name: Logic
modules.description: Flexible logic gate processor suitable for both CV and audio applications

modules.name: Mix 4
modules.description: Compact audio or CV mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: Mix 4 Stereo
modules.description: Stereo compact audio or CV mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: Mix Fade Expander
modules.description: Add symmetric mute/solo fades to any of the Mix modules

modules.name: Mix Fade 2 Expander
modules.description: Add independent rise/fall fades for mute/solo to any of the Mix modules

modules.name: Mix Mute Expander
modules.description: Add mutes to any of the Mix modules

modules.name: Mix Offset Expander
modules.description: Add offset control to any of the Mix modules

modules.name: Mix Pan Expander
modules.description: Add pan control to either of the stereo Mix modules

modules.name: Mix Aux Send Expander
modules.description: Add aux send/return to any of the Mix modules

modules.name: Mix Solo Expander
modules.description: Add solo to any of the Mix modules

modules.name: Multi Merge
modules.description: Merge one or more sets of mono and/or poly inputs into polyphonic outputs

modules.name: Multi Split
modules.description: Split one or more poly inputs into multiple mono or poly outputs

modules.name: Non-Octave-Repeating Scale Intervallic Quantizer
modules.description: Quantizer for any scale defined by up to 13 intervals between notes

modules.name: NORSIQ Chord To Scale
modules.description: Convert a polyphonic chord into CV to generate a scale for the Non-Octave_Repeating Scale Intervallic Quantizer

modules.name: Poly Clone
modules.description: Clone each channel of a polyphonic input and merge the results into a single polyphonic output

modules.name: Poly Offset
modules.description: Provides an offset control for each channel of a polyphonic signal

modules.name: Poly Sample & Hold Analog Shift Register
modules.description: Ten channel polyphonic sample and hold combined with a shift register

modules.name: Poly Scale
modules.description: Provides a level control for each channel of a polyphonic signal

modules.name: Poly Unison
modules.description: Replicate each channel of a polyphonic input with a variable detune spread, and merge the results into a single polyphonic output

modules.name: Push 5
modules.description: 5 configurable push buttons

modules.name: Recurse
modules.description: Recursively process an input via Send/Return, with built in scaling and offset cababilities

modules.name: Recurse Stereo
modules.description: Recursively process mono or stereo input via Send/Return, with built in scaling and offset cababilities

modules.name: Reformation
modules.description: Transform CV or audio by mapping way point voltages to new values

modules.name: Rhythm Explorer
modules.description: Random rhythm generator, trigger sequencer and clock divider

modules.name: Shaped VCA
modules.description: Stereo VCA with a variable response curve, hard/soft clipping, ring modulation, and oversampling

modules.name: VCA Mix 4
modules.description: Compact audio or CV VCA, mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: VCA Mix 4 Stereo
modules.description: Stereo compact audio or CV VCA, mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: VCO Lab
modules.description: Audio or low frequency oscillator with 4 simultaneous waveforms, mixing, linear/exponential FM, phase modulation, hard/soft sync, PWM, and more

modules.name: Venom Blank
modules.description: A 3hp blank with standard Venom themes

modules.name: Widget Menu Extender
modules.description: Extend context menus to support parameter/port renaming and parameter custom defaults

modules.name: WinComp
modules.description: Windowed comparator and rectifier
